Our Chrome Extension is packed with advanced tools and features to streamline your Amazon Merch workflow, enhance your designs, and boost productivity.

Core Features:

* Bulk Design Download: Download multiple merch designs effortlessly for easy access and modification.
* Quick Product Search: Instantly locate specific products or designs using the built-in search tool.
* Market Insights: Count similar products on Amazon Merch to gain valuable insights and make informed decisions.
* Enhanced Product Display: Automatically reposition the Best Sellers Rank (BSR) and Date First Available closer to the price for quick reference.
* Seamless Dashboard Integration: Works perfectly with your Amazon Merch seller dashboard.
* Language Selection: Personalize your experience by choosing your preferred language.

New and Advanced Tools:
Our latest update introduces groundbreaking features, accessible directly from the menu:

* AI-Powered Prompt Creation:
Create prompts with ChatGPT to generate creative and efficient prompts tailored to your designs.
Create prompts with Google Gemini to utilize the advanced capabilities of Gemini for smarter prompt creation.
Create prompts with LLaVA, another powerful tool to craft prompts for enhancing your workflow.

* Image Enhancement:
Upscale Images to 4x using AI technology to ensure high-resolution outputs.
Background Removal:
Remove Monochrome Backgrounds using Ideogram to quickly eliminate single-color backgrounds.

* Remove Backgrounds from Images to get rid of complex or cluttered backgrounds with ease, leaving you with clean visuals.
Streamlined Workflow:
Our user-friendly interface ensures you can easily navigate and make use of all these features to simplify your workflow, enhance designs, and save time.

Note: To unlock the full range of features, including design extraction, please install our additional software (compatible with MacOS/Windows) here: https://opchon.com/autocrawl/download
